{
  "agent": "compliance-officer",
  "atomicity": {
    "is_atomic": false,
    "reasons": [
      "Feature spans multiple domains: project management (lesson planning), development (code implementation), documentation (learning materials)",
      "Involves 10+ distinct lessons requiring different technical implementations",
      "Crosses multiple components: lesson files, example code, documentation, testing infrastructure",
      "Requires coordination between learning content creation, code development, and validation",
      "Each lesson is independently atomic but collectively represents a complex multi-phase learning journey"
    ]
  },
  "proposed_tasks": [
    {
      "id": "001",
      "agent": "documentation-writer",
      "objective": "Create Lesson 01 content structure and learning objectives document",
      "affected_components": [
        "lessons/01-hello-langgraph/"
      ],
      "dependencies": [],
      "acceptance": [
        "README.md exists with concept, why-it-matters, build, test, extend sections",
        "Learning objectives clearly defined with 3-5 measurable outcomes",
        "Prerequisites documented with setup verification steps",
        "Expected time-to-complete specified (target: 30-45 minutes)",
        "Key takeaways section includes 3-5 critical insights"
      ],
      "risk": [
        "Content may be too advanced or too basic for target audience"
      ],
      "effort": "S"
    },
    {
      "id": "002",
      "agent": "python-developer",
      "objective": "Implement minimal 2-node LangGraph workflow for Lesson 01",
      "affected_components": [
        "lessons/01-hello-langgraph/hello_workflow.py"
      ],
      "dependencies": [],
      "acceptance": [
        "Workflow has exactly 2 nodes: greet and farewell",
        "Uses StateGraph with TypedDict state schema",
        "Successfully compiles and executes with test input",
        "Code includes inline comments explaining each LangGraph concept",
        "All tests pass with 100% coverage"
      ],
      "risk": [
        "LangGraph API changes may require code updates"
